102-23 Chair of the highest governance body Chairperson of the Board. The positions of Chairperson of the Board and Chief Executive Officer may be 
held by the same person; provided however that in the event that the Chief Executive Officer or another 
employee of the Company is serving as the Chairperson of the Board, the independent directors of 
the Board shall designate a lead independent director with such duties and responsibilities as shall be 
determined by the Nominating and Governance Committee of the Board. (KLA Corporate Governance 
Standards, 11/4/2021)
